name: 李震華
objective:
「新興支付應用暨產業發展」是一門探討現今支付產業趨勢的課程，課程內容包括了第三方電子支付、行動支付、跨領域支付應用、先買後付（Buy Now Pay Later, BNPL）及加密貨幣支付等。同時課程也會探討其產業發展脈絡、業者策略及監管等相關議題
This course explores current payment industry trends. The course content includes third-party electronic payments, mobile payments, cross-domain payment applications, Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL), and encrypted currency payments. At the same time, the course will also explore related issues such as industry development context, operator strategies, and regulation.
